metadata.title: Comprehensive Cell Biology Imaging Dataset
metadata.description: This dataset contains a complete workflow of cell imaging activities including synthesis, collection, sample preparation, growth protocols, image acquisition, processing, and analysis.

provenances.description: Synthesis of HeLa cells using standard culture medium with 10% FBS and penicillin-streptomycin. Cells were grown to 80% confluence.

provenances.specimen_name: Collected HeLa cells from culture plate
provenances.description: Cells were collected using trypsinization technique. After 5 minutes of incubation with 0.25% trypsin-EDTA, cells were resuspended in fresh media.

sample_preparation.title: Standard Fixation Protocol for Fluorescence Microscopy
Custom Permeabilization Protocol
sample_preparation.description: Cells were permeabilized using 0.1% Triton X-100 in PBS for 10 minutes at room temperature. Samples were then washed three times with PBS, 5 minutes each wash. This custom protocol was optimized for maintaining cell morphology while allowing antibody penetration.

growth_protocol.title: DMEM Growth Protocol for Mammalian Cells
Optimized Growth Protocol for HeLa Cells
growth_protocol.description: Cells were maintained in DMEM supplemented with 10% heat-inactivated FBS, 2mM L-glutamine, and 1% penicillin-streptomycin. Cultures were maintained at 37°C in a humidified atmosphere with 5% CO2. Medium was changed every 2-3 days and cells were passaged when reaching 80-90% confluence.

provenances.name: Deconvolution and Background Subtraction
provenances.description: Images were deconvolved using Richardson-Lucy algorithm with 10 iterations. Background was subtracted using rolling ball algorithm with radius 50 pixels. Processing script available at: https://github.com/example/imaging-pipeline/blob/main/deconvolution.py

provenances.name: Cell Area and Circularity Measurement
provenances.description: Automated segmentation was performed using Otsu thresholding followed by watershed algorithm. For each segmented cell, area (in μm²) and circularity (4π*area/perimeter²) were measured. Analysis macro available at: https://github.com/example/imaging-pipeline/blob/main/measure_cells.ijm
